nodes.text: The GPE-3300 was a high performance airspeeder designed by Galactic Power Engineering. It was an unorthodox design that had two large engines and an underslung cockpit. This made it hard to land on solid ground and it usually had to dock at floating platforms.
It was fast and maneuverable, and many were owned by Imperial officers as a status symbol. They were also often used by planetary police forces as pursuit craft.
